item.description:
In honor of the 200th Anniversary of the birth of Giuseppe Verdi, the
Coro-Dante dedicates its spring program to him with an All-Verdi
Concert.  Kevin Galiè, the founder of the Coro-Dante, will conduct.

The concert takes place at the Dante Alighieri Society on Sunday May
19th at 5:00 PM. Refreshments will be served afterwards.

Choruses from Nabucco, La Traviata, I due Foscari, The Sottish Play,
Il Trovatore, I Lombardi alla Prima Crociata, and La Forza del destino
will be presented.  There will also be solos by our guest tenor,
Jeffrey Michael Hartman, who has performed with the Coro-Dante since
its inception 6 years ago.  Please join us at this fun event.  Free
and open to the public. Donations gratefully accepted.

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Lunedì Italiano

item.name: Coro-Dante Spring Verdi Tribute Concert!
